Title: 50 Useful Python scripts - free pdf download
Description: This is a collection of various Python scripts and projects, ranging from JSON to CSV conversion and password generation to web scraping and image watermarking. It also includes examples like currency conversion, stopwatch creation, sudoku solving, file encryption, automated email sending, and more. There are 50 different scripts and mini-projects in total, each with its own unique functionality and purpose.
Author: Harendra Kumar Kanojiya
